description: During the 2019 October protests a video of a belly dancer in the middle of the protest went viral. Since then, critics of the revolution will use the expression “رقاصة الرينغ” (ring dance/r) to demean women’s voices.
title: Belly Dancer

description: Prime Minister Saad Hariri reportedly gave a 16M$ gift to South African model Candice van der Merwe.
title: The Gift

description: In the spirit of “revolution stole by thugs”, women who participated are labeled as prostitutes, sadistic masochist, and other insane labels
title: The Gift

description: Claiming that a woman has a relationship with X
title: Claims of having an affair

description: Attacks, or spreading rumors about Dima Sadek
title: Smear campaign against Dima Sadek
Smear campaign against Judge Ghada Aoun

description: A former lebanese porn star, who supported the revolution, is used by critics of the revolution to tarnish the image of the women's voices.
title: Pornstar
